xdi2.core.features.linkcontracts
Class LinkContract

java.lang.Object
  xdi2.core.features.linkcontracts.LinkContract
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<LinkContract>
public final class LinkContract
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable<LinkContract>

An XDI link contract, represented as a context node.

Author:
markus
